basics.name: Danijel StaniÄ‡
basics.label: Full Stack Web & Mobile Developer
basics.summary: Developer with 2 years of expertise in building complex web and mobile applications using modern JavaScript frameworks and Python/Django backend solutions. Experience in implementing GIS technologies and geospatial applications for web and mobile platforms. Background in environmental consulting brings unique analytical and problem-solving perspectives to software development projects.

work.name: Prehnit & 3B Infra
work.summary: Full-stack developer working on GIS-focused web applications and mobile development. Split time between internal projects at Prehnit and client work for 3B Infra's railway infrastructure management platform.
highlights: Led development of municipal waste management application, managing team and client communication
Developed GIS-focused web applications using React.js/TypeScript and Django
Served as primary developer for cross-border cyclist mobile app, handling full project lifecycle from design to store deployment
Maintained and enhanced React Native mobile application for railway infrastructure management

work.name: Ires Ekologija d.o.o
work.summary: Environmental consultant specializing in impact assessments with focus on water resources and geodiversity. Used GIS tools for spatial analysis and visualization of environmental data.
highlights: Conducted environmental and strategic impact assessments for various development projects
Led internal GIS training programs and implemented GIS solutions for environmental analysis

education.institution: Faculty of Mining, Geology and Petroleum Engineering, University of Zagreb
